segments.text: I see the jars of cookies practically calling out to the children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's little triumph as he reaches for one sparks a wave of nostalgia.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I think, he’s on that flimsy stool, and I feel my heart race.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s frustrating that the woman doesn’t notice the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is so narrow, just on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find it hard to believe she can't see the water spilling out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl by his side looks eager and ready for whatever happens next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost comical how they don’t feel the tension building in the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how much I wanted cookies at that age too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But at what cost? I can't shake the worry that something will go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR
